item.description: Selected Exercises 1. Suppose we play a game where we start with $ c $ dollars. On each play of the game you either double or halve your money, with equal probability. What is your expected fortune after $ n $ trials? I’m pretty sure we can use a trick that I’ve seen a lot in machine learning to solve this using plain old expectations.
